testcase.name: should display HTML table and form below it when the page is opened
should populate exam rule in form when name of rule is clicked
should clear exam rule in form and display rule id 0 when create new rule button is clicked
should display modified data in grid when a rule data is modified in form and submit button is clicked
should add new rule to the grid when create new rule button is clicked, rule data is entered and submit button is clicked
should delete rows from the grid when delete checkboxes are selected and then the delete selected rule button is clicked
